text: Oleg Alekseyevich Moliboga (, ; 27 February 1953 – 9 June 2022) was a Soviet volleyball player and Russian volleyball coach. He was born in Dnipro, Soviet Union. He took part in the 1976 Summer Olympics and in the 1980 Summer Olympics. He won a silver medal in 1976 and a gold medal in 1980. Moliboga died on 9 June 2022, aged 69.Ушел из жизни Молибога О.А. ==References== Category:1953 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Russian volleyball players Category:People from Dnipropetrovsk Oblast
title: Oleg Moliboga
